thread.title: Interim coaches face tricky situations, uncertain futures
thread.title_full: Interim coaches face tricky situations, uncertain futures

title: Interim coaches face tricky situations, uncertain futures
text: > Texas Interim coaches face tricky situations, uncertain futures FILE - In this Dec. 21, 2013 file photo, then-Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton, right, and offensive tackle Kevin Graff embrace after their victory over Fresno State in the Las Vegas Bowl NCAA college football game in Las Vegas. Helton, the current offensive coordinator, will once again assume the USC helm as interim coach after the firing of Steve Sarkisian, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015. Helton was named interim coach Sunday, one day after Sarkisian was put on leave. (AP Photo/David Cleveland, File)
